answers.answer: Have you been diagnosed with Diabetes?  Have you been eating really sugary foods or consuming alcohol?  You may want to consult with an endocrinoligist since they deal with blood sugar issues and such.Good luck.
Yes, your blood sugar ups and downs could be causing you to feel drunk.  You need to call your doctor right away.

question: for the last three days I been fellinf drunk when I stand or get out of bed   my blood sugar has been up and down for a bout a week now  like this morning at 730 it was 147 and about an hour later it was207 what wrong with me
title: dizzy  felling drunk
